subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Juan Lagares is playing with an injured right elbow, and he is essentially set to be replaced in center field by Yoenis Cespedes for the last two months of the season.
snippet: Juan Lagares is playing with an injured right elbow, and he is essentially set to be replaced in center field by Yoenis Cespedes for the last two months of the season.
